scripts.stage:a: npm run stage:a:typecheck && npm run stage:a:lint && npm run stage:a:dependencies && npm run stage:a:dead-exports && npm run stage:a:duplication
scripts.stage:a:typecheck: npm run typecheck --prefix backend && npm run typecheck --prefix mobile && npm run typecheck --prefix shared
scripts.stage:a:lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix mobile && npm run lint --prefix shared
scripts.stage:a:dead-exports: ts-prune -p backend/tsconfig.json && ts-prune -p mobile/tsconfig.json && ts-prune -p shared/tsconfig.json
